TunableList.name: RELATIONSHIP_EXPECTATIONS
TunableList.description: A mapping between the Relationship Expectation Type, Relationship Expectation Status and the corresponding traits and weights for easy lookup.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The Relationship Expectation Type to index the Relationship Expectation Status to.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tuple of the corresponding trait and random weighted choice for generated sims, via sim template, to exist with the corresponding trait.

Tunable.name: no_trait
Tunable.description: Reference to the trait that denotes that the Sim has this Relationship Expectation Type and Status.

Tunable.name: yes_trait
Tunable.description: Reference to the trait that denotes that the Sim has this Relationship Expectation Type and Status.

Tunable.name: yes_trait_generation_chance
Tunable.description: The chance to denote the percentage of generated sims, via sim template, we want to exist with the yes trait.
